title: Arthur Bazolli Alvarenga
text:
Master’s student in Economics at UFJF, Brazil.
Passionate about cities, I research about regional and urban economics, especially agglomeration economies, accessibility, and land use.

title: Arthur Bazolli Alvarenga
text:
Education
Universidade Federal de Juiz de Fora (UFJF) | Juiz de Fora, Brazil M.Sc. in Applied Economics | March 2022 - present
Ibmec | Belo Horizonte, Brazil B.Sc. in Economics | February 2017 - December 2021
